conversation.text: Of course! Based on your interest in music movies, I recommend "Inside Llewyn Davis" and "Amadeus." Both films offer a unique perspective on the world of music, with "Inside Llewyn Davis" following a young singer navigating the Greenwich Village folk scene in the early 1960s, and "Amadeus" telling the story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's life, success, and troubles as told by his contemporaneous composer Antonio Salieri. Both films feature talented actors and offer a fascinating look into the world of music and its impact on those who create it.
